Module ing.sw.puddu.rios.rizzo

Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    represents a generalization of the actions that a worker can perform
    ActionTree
    A tree of Actions.
    Board
    Represents the actual game board of the game.
    BuildAction
    represents the action of building any type of building on a space
    Card
    Represents an actual card of the game, associated with a specific god power.
    Deck
    Represents the deck of all possible cards in the game.
    Game
    stores information about the general state of the game, such as what cards compose the deck, whose turn it is and what are the possible actions for the current player's turn
    MapConvertible
    groups similar snippets of code from all the class that support map conversion
    Model
    Master class of the model package, exposes most methods and is the head of the reference structure of the model package
    MoveAction
    represents the action of moving a worker, as performed by a player in their turn
    MoveAndForceAction
    represents the action of moving a worker, and in doing so causing an opponent's worker to change its position too, thereby forcing it
    PersistenceGame
    abstracts from game, keeping some information and adding some missing info objects of this class will contain the general info needed to save and load a game the turn archive will instead provide precise details about the actions taken in the turns
    PieceBag
    Represents the collection of finite pieces available to build.
    Player
    represents a player.
    SetupAction
    represents the action of placing a worker on the board for the first time, as it happens during the setup of the game
    Space
    Represents each tile on the board Can be built upon with Pieces, and can have a Worker on
    Turn
    aggregates multiple actions that belong to the same player, representing the more complex idea of turn
    TurnArchive
    stores memory of all the actions taken by the players during the game
    Worker
    Represents a worker.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Color
    enum representing the possible colors of the workers
    Direction
    represents the directions in which a worker can move
    Phase
    Enumerates the possible phases that the game can be in
    Piece
    Enumerates the possible building levels that can be build on a Space, including ground level
    Sex
    Enumerates the possibles sexes of the workers
